name: T-bone Steak
description: T-bone steak is a cut from the short loin, featuring a T-shaped bone with tenderloin on one side and strip steak on the other.

name: Ribeye Steak
description: Ribeye steak is cut from the rib section, known for its rich marbling and robust taste.

name: Sirloin Steak
description: Sirloin steak is derived from the hip area, offering a balance of tenderness and flavor.

name: Rump Steak
description: Rump steak is from the hindquarters, leaner and less tender but flavorful when properly cooked.
